meta.title: NCC Vo-Tech's Remote Learning Plan During School Closure - Delcastle

meta.content: NCC Vo-Tech's Remote Learning Plan During School Closure - Delcastle

The following plan for how NCC Vo-Tech is providing remote learning during this time of school closure has been submitted to and reviewed by the Delaware Department of Education. This plan takes students through the May 15 closure. Dates that are listed as Last Days are tentative, and dependent on any additional changes forthcoming from...

b.span: Click here for important information from the Wellness Center during school closure.

div.p:
Delcastle offers a variety of educational experiences for students integrating academic courses with practical vocational-technical problem solving. Lessons learned in math and English are re-enforced in the student’s career program.
Visit Website

Built in 1974, Hodgson has approximately 1,100 students enrolled in its full-time career training programs.
Visit Website

span.data-title: Teacher Academy for Early Childhood Education

a.span: Teacher Academy for Early Childhood Education

div.p:
Howard provides a rigorous, comprehensive, vocational technical program in a modern setting with deep historical roots.
Visit Website

The newest comprehensive, 1000-pupil VoTech high school opened in November 2006.
Visit Website

select.option:
About Us
- Administration - Alumni - Athletics - Contact - Cooperative Employment - Directions - News & Announcements - School Calendar - School Closings - School Monitors - School Resource Officer - Staff Directory - Student Advisors

Career Programs
- 9th Grade Academy - Business, Communication & Computers - Construction Technologies - Health Services - Public & Consumer Services - Science, Energy & Drafting Technologies - Transportation

Academic Programs
- English - Mathematics - Health, Physical Education, and Driver Education - Science - Social Studies - Spanish

Student Services
- Academic Support - Activity Bus Schedules - Attendance - Chromebooks - Chromebook Insurance Payments - College Application Process - Grades - School Counselors - Library / Media - Need your Transcript? - Schedules - Student Driving - Standardized Testing - Miscellaneous School Payments

img.alt: NCC Vo-Tech’s Remote Learning Plan During School Closure

div.h1: NCC Vo-Tech’s Remote Learning Plan During School Closure

div.p: The following plan for how NCC Vo-Tech is providing remote learning during this time of school closure has been submitted to and reviewed by the Delaware Department of Education. This plan takes students through the May 15 closure. Dates that are listed as Last Days are tentative, and dependent on any additional changes forthcoming from state officials.
